title: Nice place, pleasant atmosphere and good food
text: Very nice and cosy place.The food is delicious. the waiters are very friendly and helpful.had a very nice time.

title: Childhood dream
text: After hearing all sorts of stories on Acropolis since childhood and to finally see it for real was just unbelievable.

title: Meteora visit
text: Breathtaking views. Very peaceful. Should definitely be done once in a lifetime. Should opt for the first class if travelling by train.

title: To be done once in a lifetime
text: The guide Katerina was very nice and friendly. The trip by train was very tiring though. Should definitely opt for a first class. But the tour itself was very enriching with breathtaking views.

title: Excellent
text:
Excellent location, brand new hotel. The staff is great, really friendly and very welcoming.

Food is nice and lots of choice for breakfast.

Room was very comfortable and nothing like the jacuzzi after a long day.

I would highly recommend this hotel
